title: EXLURA Women's 2025 Casual Long Lantern Sleeve Dresses Square Neck Ruffle Tie Back Elastic Waist Aline Short Mini Dress
description: Material: Lightweight, flowy, comfy, Flattering,cute.This fairy dress is fit for spring, summer, fall and early winter.

Feature: tie back, square neack, ruched bust, smocked waist, elastic high waist, lantern sleeve, long sleeve, elastic cuff, above knee length, A line, slim fit, swing and elegant vintage chiffon dress.
Design: The elastic smocked waist dress shows the body curves and hide tummy pretty well. Sexy tie back with adjustable self-tie bowknot. Pretty ruffle hemline finish.
Occassion: This cute dress is suitable for many occasions, such as date night, dating, night out, weddings, vacations, vacations, beach, graduation, homecoming, etc.
Notes:Wash recommended with cold water/Do not bleach/Hang or line dry/Wash with like colors, that will increase the durability of your clothes.
